text.name: Custom text
text.hint: The text you want to appear as the tabs title

active.name: Active
active.hint: If the custom tab title should be applied

scene.name: Use scene name
scene.hint: When active, the name of the currently viewed scene will be used. Only works when the module is toggled active.

world.name: Use world name
world.hint: When active, the name of the currently active world is used. Only works when the module is toggled active.
